attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-1374

Date: 2007-09-18

Her Excellency the Governor in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Natural Resources, pursuant to subsection 21(2) and subsection 21.1(1) of the

National Energy Board Act, approves the issuance of Amending Order AO-2-EC-25 by the National Energy Board to

Abitibi-Consolidated Hydro Inc., on behalf of ACH Limited Partnership, copies of which are attached hereto.


Sur recommandation du ministre des Ressources naturelles et en vertu des paragraphes 21(2) et 21.1 (1) de la Loi sur l’Office national de l’énergie, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil agrée la délivrance, par l’Office national de l’énergie, de l’ordonnance modificatrice AO-2-EC-25 ci-annexée à Abitibi-Consolidated Hydro Inc., au nom D’ach Limited Partnership.
